title.value: Подбор питательной среды для культивирования бактерий рода Salmonella, Escherichia, Proteus, Klebsiella, Pasteurella, Mannheimia
Selection of growing medium for the cultivation of bacteria genus Salmonella, Escherichia, Proteus, Klebsiella, Pasteurella, Mannheimia

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Shpilevskii, D.O., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was studied the influence of culture medium on accumulation of bacterial cells of the following cultures: Salmonella Dublin, Escherichia coli, Proteus mirabilis, Klebsiella, pneumonia, Pastetrella multocida, Mannheimia haemolytica. In the article the question of the use а different composition of culture media for growing bacteria was reviewed. Every organism needs certain nutritional supplements. In course of the study there were used synthetic, semi-synthetic and natural media. In course of the study there was realized cultivation of microorganisms at the selected media. There was determined the optimal nutritive medium for each microorganism taking into account the amount of accumulated bacterial mass. We established the natural culture media to provide а higher growing of bacteria in comparison with synthetic.
